Subject: THE SUPER BIG MEGA LARGE KILLING DEATH TIME BATTLE OF DOOM!

::DEEPBLUE::
DEEPBLUE walks up the to predacon base.
"PREPARE TO DIE HE SCREAMS!"
He charges head first at full speed and rams the base with all of his 
might.  He gets up, a bit rattled but still determined.
"THIS BATTLE IS MINE!"
DEEPBLUE then opens his mouth reaal wide and starts starts gnawing on 
the hull.
"IM GONNA EAT YOU ALL ALIVE!"
DEEPBLUE slowly unholsters his double plasma relay.
"So you wanna play hardball eh?"
He grasps it tightly in his hands, charges once more, and starts 
bashing the hull with the butt of the gun.
"ANYONE ELSE THINK THEY CAN TAKE ME?"
